availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carroll County, Kentucky, farmer. Indiana native. Married to Martha Harrison Lee on February 10, 1853. Father of Alma E. Lee, Louisa M. Lee, William A. Lee, Frank Harrison Lee, and Charles F. Lee. Laborer in Carroll County in 1850. Farmer in Carroll County in 1860 and 1863.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 2, p. 422. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 2, p. 49. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Locust, p. 4. Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Carroll County, KY, June/July 1863, p. 147, (Accessed via ancestry.com). Kentucky, Marriage Records, 1852-1914, Ancestry, Carroll County, 1853.
